Name: Surfer On Acid (shot)
Instructions: SHAKE first 2 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. FLOAT amaro liqueur.
Review: The spirity herbal topping counters the sweet coconut and pineapple base.
History: Created by Eric "ET" Tecosky (also the man behind Dirty Sue Olive Brine) at Jones Hollywood Café, Santa Monica Boulevard, West Hollywood, California, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Surfer On Acid (shot) contains 63 calories
